official_title: Resolved, that Mr. Laxalt of Nevada is hereby assigned to service on the Committee on Appropriations and the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs during the remainder of the 93d Congress.

summary.text: Assigns Senator Laxalt to service on the Committee on Appropriations and the Committee on Internal and Insular Affairs during the remainder of the 93rd Congress.

titles.title: Resolved, that Mr. Laxalt of Nevada is hereby assigned to service on the Committee on Appropriations and the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs during the remainder of the 93d Congress.
